items.sentence: Didn\'t you notice that Tom was looking at you?
Why did Tom think it was a bad idea to do that?
Why did you think it was a bad idea to do that?
Why do you know so much about Japanese history?
I wouldn\'t have succeeded without Tom\'s help.
What made you think that Tom liked heavy metal?
On the average, I go to the movies once a week.
Tom looked around to make sure they were alone.
The court\'s decision could be announced today.
One of my friends can speak French fairly well.
